title: Dino Merge Wars
description: Dino Merge Wars is an action arcade game where you'll use a variety of powerful dinosaurs and humanoid characters on the battlefield to defeat fearsome dinos and emerge victorious. With a large selection of unique units, you'll have to set a strategize and decide which ones to send into battle. You can even merge your units to create even more powerful characters! You'll also be able to create your own dino riders, combining a dinosaur and a humanoid character. Thus, you'll be able to unleash devastating attacks and turn the tide of battle in your favor. Protect your Dino Egg and make sure it remains solid till your next battle! So what are you waiting for? Play Dino Merge Wars today and join the fight for survival!
